Class Summary

LazyTestsToRun A variant of TestsToRun that is provided with test class names from an InputStream (e.g.
ReflectionUtils  
RunOrder A RunOrder specifies the order in which the tests will be run.
TestsToRun Contains all the tests that have been found according to specified include/exclude specification for a given surefire run.

Exception Summary
NestedCheckedException Copied from Spring framework to keep Java 1.3 compatibility.
NestedRuntimeException Copied from Spring framework to keep Java 1.3 compatability.
SurefireReflectionException Exception indicating that surefire hard problems with reflection.
